DESCRIPTION.GF_BALANCE_RECOVERY_DEBIT: To be used when balance needs voiding to null the account (Suspicious Account, Circumvention of any type..)
DESCRIPTION.GF_BALANCE_RECOVERY_CREDIT: To be used to credit balance after it had previously been voided to null the account (Suspicious Account, Circumvention of any type..)
DESCRIPTION.GF_SE_BALANCE_WITHHOLD_DEBIT: To be used when temporary withholding balance until bank details are received.
DESCRIPTION.GF_SE_BALANCE_WITHHOLD_CREDIT: To be used to credit balance that had previously been temporarily removed to withhold balance until bank details were received.
